title: No countdown sound in champ select?
body: Though not always required, I liked having the loud ticking noise as the counter approaches from 5 to 0 simply cause I get distracted and have to look away for a bit. Why was this removed?

replies.body: The sounds are supposed to play from 10-0. They will not play, however, if you've muted sound in the client. We're working on adding more granular sound settings, but that didnt make it into the 6.22 patch. If you dont have sound muted and you dont hear the ticks, then thats a bug you should report. Thanks for testing the alpha!
yeah i get that when i  ALT + TAB between windows too much, i loose sound ingame too sometimes

I went through champ select to make sure and there is a countdown noise for last seconds of intent declaration, ban, and pick. There is no sound for the last 30 secs of trading. There is a sound in the last 15 in blind.
